CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: full rubber bullet
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Completely solid rubber bullet with a smaller gunpowder load for less lethal performance.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: steel core rubber bullet
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Less lethal rubber-jacketed round featuring a hardened steel core for increased mass, inertia and stopping power.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: hollow rubber bullet
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Hollow rubber bullet with less mass and stopping power than solid rubber. Used to quell riots without killing or violently maiming.
